items.summary: Add a second pie/donut chart visualization inside the "üê∫ Meme Coin Style Version (Fun + Viral)" card in the Tokenomics section to visually represent the same $LWOLF allocation breakdown (35% Public Sale, 20% Liquidity, 15% Rewards, 10% Marketing, 10% Dev Team, 5% Airdrops, 5% Treasury), while keeping the existing meme-style text content intact and in English.

Ensure the Meme Coin Style pie/donut chart matches the existing neon dark styling and animations used by the current Tokenomics chart (glow, hover feedback, scroll/entrance animation), and remains mobile-responsive (chart and legend/content stack cleanly on small screens).
